name: v1.0.13
body:
## Changes
- Fix a potentially impactful bug with RLE encoding
- Move this to a nes.science subdomain 
- Add debug files to .gitignore for created projects

## Commits
- 06bfaae: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.12 
- 8cd0dc3: Automated documentation push
- 4ba4603: For next release, add debug files to gitignore
- c09fa6d: Minor typo, big impact
- 52331c9: Try to move to create-nes-game.nes.science
- 5196d36: Try to fix actions build after move
- 7047586: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.13
- ad8cd59: Fix release notes too

name: v1.0.12
body:
## Changes
* Re-add neslib palette initialization code (Thanks Dunnymeister!) 
* Update neslib base code to use `pal_bg` to load palettes instead of doing it manually
* Update internal tests to be more cross-platform friendly

## Commits
- 759414a: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.11
- 497274c: Automated documentation push 
- 322c7ae: Automated documentation push
- d7f2368: Restoring missing neslib palette initialization code (#3) (Dunnymeister) [#3](https://github.com/igwgames/create-nes-game/pull/3)
- f56aa74: Get rid of dependency on 'mv' command
- 2c10d01: Add retries 
- 3470bc9: Switch default neslib code to use built-in method for palette loading

name: v1.0.11
body:
## Changes
- Fix a bug with mmc3 causing chr bank switching to work incorrectly. Thanks Figbash!
- Another fix to stability with stream-zip

## Commits
- 4710c7c: Explain to future me why I did this mess
- 0894346: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.10
- 83769f3: Fix a bug with mmc3, thanks Figbash!
- 00eaf09: Work around the obnoxious stream-zip error in the tests

name: v1.0.10
body:
## Changes
- Start supporting [nes-starter-kit](https://nes-starter-kit.nes.science)
- Improve stability of stream-zip. If you've seen errors like "Bad Archive" try this or a later release (more fixes were found)

## Commits
- 50392ff: Automated documentation push
- 24cd189: Adding nes-starter-kit as a tutorial
- 6903274: Remove duplicate code
- 68bf7af: Make chunk tutorial size smaller to try to fix quirky streamzip/os limitation/something
- 97d58f1: Make chunk tutorial size smaller to try to fix quirky streamzip/os limitation/something (but really this time)
- 85ee3ef: Try chunking rom gen
- bda65ee: Trying something... 
- af518c1: Well I'm out of good ideas

name: v1.0.9
body:
## Changes
- Add support for hooks run before or after most build steps and commands
- Add a version command (this is definitely overdue)
- Add vs-code config by default, so builds can be done automatically.
- Add support for downloading and unzipping extra dependencies into the tools folder
- Don't break things when a directory needs to be created recursively

## Commits
- 83a4e6e: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.8 
- e9cae54: Add pre/post command abilities, vscode config, version command
- e2d4fcf: Try to make build less whiny
- f6a7acb: Automated documentation push
- 1b70527: Automated documentation push
- b1c4992: Maybe fix the release notes automation
- c1d8a1f: Meh, manual site updates to avoid redoing that release
- c9c93fa: Replace readme with latest too 
- 8a0e54f: Automated documentation push
- da0fd13: Bad logging causes errors

name: v1.0.8
body:
## Changes
- Fixing a nasty bug with the past version, where arguments were parsed wrong.

## Commits
- ba2823d: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.7 
- f75cfee: Automated documentation push 
- 710df17: Fix a bug from last release

name: v1.0.7
body:
## Changes
- Allow the use of --compiler-options --linker-options and --assembler-options to pass arguments down to the underlying programs

## Commits

- ad539b6: Automated documentation push
- 2840a50: Adding some more settings to configure ca65/cc65/etc behind the scenes

name: v1.0.5
body:
## Changes
- Mapper methods should actually work now; there was a minor mistake with exports that would result in unresolve externals

## Commits
- 0a9b433: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.4
- a1ab645: Automated documentation push
- Actually export the mapper methods

name: v1.0.4
body:
## Changes
- Fixed a bug that caused create-nes-game to get add to PATH with every install
- Allow recursive file structures in C projects

## Commits
- f275e47: Automated documentation push for release v1.0.3
- 1590af8: Automated documentation push
- 92b2828: Credit JamesSheppardd
- 48e9c4e: Fix a bug where installing on windows will add to the path more than once
- 0c9ea4f: Allow recursive definition, and re-add the reset method neslib exposes

name: v1.0.3
body:
## Changes
- Add support for starting from nerdy nights tutorials 

## Commits

- 1568889: Fix documentation around nsf2data and text2data, I no longer bundle binaries since they vary
- 5f76a9c: Allow creating nerdy nights tutorials automatically
- fad983e: Update readme
